title: Cross Reference Information For Gene Entities
description: An crossReference entity (e.g.: NCBIGENE links, UniProt Links and links back to MODs).

dataProvider.description: Constraints the dataProvider to conform to the dataProvider schema.  This schema enforces that a dataProvider provide the taxonId of the record being added, as well as the database source.  see dataProvider.json for more information.

localId.description: The primary local identifier of the related resource. For example FBgnNNNN, ENSGnnnn. For NCBI gene this would be a number.
